Download

This section is incomplete and needs further work!

1. Navigate to preferred mirror:

  • Tier 1 mirror
  • Tor mirror

2. Download live image, checksums and checksum signature: 

$ export URL='https://repo-default.voidlinux.org/live/current'
$ wget "${URL}/sha256sum.txt"
$ wget "${URL}/sha256sum.sig"
$ wget "${URL}/void-live-x86_64-<YYYYMMDD>.iso"

3. Download public signing key:

  • Void release keys
  • void-release-<YYYYMMDD>.pub

4. Verify checksum authenticity and live image integrity: 

$ signify -V -p void-release-<YYYYMMDD>.pub -x sha256sum.sig -m sha256sum.txt
$ sha256 -C sha256sum.txt void-live-x86_64-<YYYYMMDD>.iso
